scene_description_enriched: A group of figures, all with golden halos, are depicted within a decorative border. The figures are dressed in flowing robes of red, blue, and pink. Several figures hold palm fronds, a symbol of martyrdom. One figure in the center holds a wheel, likely an attribute of Saint Catherine. The figures are arranged in a dense cluster, suggesting a gathering of saints or martyrs. The overall impression is one of heavenly assembly.
